name: NON_HODGKIN_LYMPH
description: Stores single response data for College of American Pathologists (CAP) form 76036-NON-HODGKIN LYMPHOMA/LYMPHOID NEOPLASMS: Biopsy, Resection.

columns.name: RESULT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the result record.

columns.name: PROGNSTC_FACT_SPFY
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Clinical Prognostic Factors and Indices Specify.

columns.name: TUMOR_SITE_SPECIFY
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify tumor site.

columns.name: TUMOR_LYM_NODE_SITE
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Tumor Site Lymph Nodes Site Specify.

columns.name: CAP_COMMENTS
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: General comments.

columns.name: SPEC_PROC_SPECIFY
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify the Specimen Procedure.

columns.name: SPECIMEN_OTHER_SPFY
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify other specimen.

columns.name: ADDL_PATH_FIND_SPFY
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify additional pathologic findings.

columns.name: CYTOGENETICS_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Cytogenetics.

columns.name: CYTOGENETICS_SPFY
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify cytogenetics.

columns.name: CYTOGEN_RPT_SPECIFY
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify Cytogenetic Studies Report.

columns.name: IMM_PHENOTYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Immunophenotyping (flow cytometry and/or immunohistochemistry).

columns.name: IMM_PHENO_RPT_SPFY
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify Immunophenotyping Report.

columns.name: IMM_PHENO_RSLT_SPFY
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify Immunophenotyping Results.

columns.name: PRECUR_LYM_NPLSM_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Precursor Lymphoid Neoplasms.
entries: B lymphoblastic leukemia / lymphoma with t(9;22)(q34;q11.2); BCR-ABL1
B lymphoblastic leukemia / lymphoma with t(v;11q23); MLL rearranged (Italicized)
B lymphoblastic leukemia / lymphoma with t(v;11q23); MLL rearranged
B lymphoblastic leukemia / lymphoma with t(12;21)(p13;q22); TEL-AML1 (ETV6-RUNX1)
B lymphoblastic leukemia / lymphoma with hyperdiploidy
B lymphoblastic leukemia / lymphoma with hypodiploidy (hypodiploid ALL)
B lymphoblastic leukemia / lymphoma with t(5;14)(q31;q32); IL3-IGH
B lymphoblastic leukemia / lymphoma with t(1;19)(q23;p13.3); E2A-PBX1 (TCF3-PBX1)

columns.name: MATURE_B_NEOPLASM_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Mature B-cell Neoplasms.
entries: Chronic lymphocytic leukemia / small lymphocytic lymphoma
Splenic diffuse red pulp small B-cell lymphoma
Extranodal marginal zone B-cell lymphoma of mucosa-associated lymphoid tissue
T cell / histiocyte-rich large B-cell lymphoma
Primary DLBCL of the central nervous system (CNS)
EBV positive DLBCL of the elderly
Anaplastic lymphoma kinase (ALK)-positive large B-cell lymphoma
Large B-cell lymphoma arising in HHV8-associated multicentric Castleman disease
B-cell lymphoma, unclassifiable, w/ features intermediate b/t B-Cell and Burkitt lymp
B-cell lymphoma, unclassifiable, w/ features intermediate b/t B-cell and Hodgkin lymp
B-cell lymphoma, subtype cannot be determined

columns.name: MATURE_T_NK_NPLSM_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Mature T- and NK-cell Neoplasms.
entries: T-cell lymphoma, subtype cannot be determined
Chronic lymphoproliferative disorder of NK cells
Systemic EBV-positive T-cell lymphoproliferative disease of childhood
Extranodal NK / T-cell lymphoma, nasal type
Primary cutaneous anaplastic large cell lymphoma
Primary cutaneous CD8-positive aggressive epidermotropic cytotoxic T-cell lymphoma
Primary cutaneous CD4-positive small / medium T-cell lymphoma

columns.name: HISTIO_DEND_NPLSM_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Histiocytic and Dendritic Cell Neoplasms.

columns.name: MONOMRPHC_PTLD_SPFY
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify Monomorphic PTLD (B- and T / NK-cell types).

columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Post-transplant Lymphoproliferative Disorders (PTLD).
entries: Monomorphic PTLD (B- and T / NK-cell types)
